mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( id, pw, author, real_name, account_number, ctz_number, virtuous_tax, writer_id, manager ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pw}, #{author}, #{realName}, #{accountNumber}, #{ctzNumber}, #{virtuousTax}, #{writerId}, #{manager} )
mapper.select: SELECT mem.idx, mem.id, pw, real_name, login_status, reg_date, upd_date, auth FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth auth ON mem.idx = auth.idx WHERE mem.id = #{id}

SELECT mem.idx, mem.writer_id, mem.id, author.author, mem.real_name, author.account_number, mem.ctz_number, author.virtuous_tax, mem.login_status, author.settlement_ratio, mem.manager FROM member mem INNER JOIN tb_author author ON mem.writer_id = author.writer_id
